fields.fieldText: Does the home-based business occupy more than 20 percent of the gross floor area of the home or is it more than 1,000 square feet?

fields.fieldText: Does the home-based business occupy more than 25 percent of the gross floor area of the home or secondary structure or is it more than 500 square feet?

fields.fieldText: What is the percentage or square footage of the home based business?

fields.name: Select_Unit

value.stringValue: Are you proposing to produce products assembled or manufactured on-site for resale elsewhere, professional and business services, or stock-in-trade clearly incidental to such services?

fields.name: Proposed_home_based_use
fields.fieldText: Proposed home-based use

fields.name: Does_the_person_operating_the_business_reside_in_the_home
fields.fieldText: Does the person operating the business reside in the home?

fields.name: How_many_people_how_do_not_reside_in_the_home_are_employed_by_the_business
fields.fieldText: How many people how do not reside in the home are employed by the business?

fields.name: The_home_occupation_shall_not_be_operated_between_the_hours_of_9_PM_to_6_AM_Do_y
fields.fieldText: The home occupation shall not be operated between the hours of 9 PM to 6 AM. Do you agree to this restriction?

fields.name: Is_the_outside_storage_or_display_of_materials_animals_or_items_associated_the_h
fields.fieldText: Is the outside storage or display of materials, animals, or items associated the home-based business proposed?

fields.fieldText: Is the home-based business proposed to be conducted entirely within the home or secondary structure?

fields.name: Will_anyone_who_does_not_reside_in_the_home_be_employed_at_the_business
fields.fieldText: Will anyone who does not reside in the home be employed at the business?

fields.fieldText: Will the use electrical or mechanical equipment change the fire rating of the home or structure?

fields.fieldText: Is a sign proposed?

fields.name: No_goods_stock_in_trade_or_other_commodities_shall_be_displayed_on_the_premises
fields.fieldText: No goods, stock-in-trade, or other commodities shall be displayed on the premises. Do you agree to this restriction?

fields.name: No_on_site_retail_sales_except_for_goods_made_on_the_premises_are_allowed_Do_you
fields.fieldText: No on-site retail sales, except for goods made on the premises, are allowed. Do you agree to this restriction?
